Title: On The Mend
Description: Now that you have won a battle, we need to heal up your pets so they can fight another day!  Visit Jenova Stoneshield, our local stable master, to heal and revive your pets.
ObjectivesText: Heal your pets to full health by visiting Jenova Stoneshield the Stable Master.
PortraitGiverText: Jenova Stoneshield, the local Stable Master, can heal and revive your pets.
RewardText: Now those look like some healthy pets, $n.  Remember, you can heal and revive your entire collection of pets at any time by visiting a stable master.
